other_tests.findings: Demonstrated gastritis, esophagitis, and two colonic polyps which were removed.
Demonstrated gastritis, esophagitis, and two colonic polyps which were removed.

Liver is diffusely echogenic with smooth contour, no focal liver mass; gallbladder wall is diffusely thickened with a hyperechoic tiny focus possibly representing a very small adherent stone measuring less than 5 mm.
